## sumNorm() function

Calculates the Sum Norm (or 1-Norm) of a vector `v`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sumNorm<S>(v: Vector<S>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | <code>Vector&lt;S&gt;</code> | The vector for which to calculate the norm |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

## Example


```
const v = vec([3, 4]);
const norm = sumNorm(v); // 7

```
